lead_paragraph: The affection for Kobe Bryant overflowed inside Staples Center even as it was tinged with regret about seeing the superstar closing out his career in losing fashion.

headline.print_headline: Farewell, Kobe: Lakers Lose 103-81 to Clippers as Visitors
headline.main: Farewell, Kobe: Lakers Lose 103-81 to Clippers as Visitors

snippet: The affection for Kobe Bryant overflowed inside Staples Center even as it was tinged with regret about seeing the superstar closing out his career in losing fashion....
